property.name: CreateSql
GetReportSql
property.value: SELECT id, [name], address, phone, email, visited, visitdate, college, newtoarea, howhear, contactme, faith, churchhome, worship, teaching, youth, [service], love, evangelism, othertext, [commentsprayer], create_date, create_user, last_upd_date, last_upd_user FROM rpcwc.guest_reg LEFT OUTER JOIN rpcwc.guest_tag ON guest_reg.id = guest_tag.guest_id AND guest_tag.tag_cd = 'IP' WHERE guest_tag.guest_id IS NULL ORDER BY guest_reg.create_date

property.name: TagGuestSql
